en: IS ALREADY ASSIGNED TO %s. DO YOU WISH TO OVERWRITE THE ACTION?

CODE, ART AND SOUNDTRACK BY MIKE KLUBNIKA
INSPIRED BY THE WORK OF DANIEL MULLINS

"BLOODSPLATTER FX PACK" BY MIA ROSADO
IS LICENSED UNDER A CREATIVE COMMONS
ATTRIBUTION 4.0 LICENSE

PLAYTESTED BY NICK, POPSTONIA,
EKU AND PATTHEHYRULER

THANK YOU FOR PLAYING!

YOU'RE LUCKY IT LEFT YOU
WITH A CHARGE!

I INSERT THE SHELLS
IN AN UNKNOWN ORDER.

THEY ENTER THE CHAMBER
IN A HIDDEN SEQUENCE.

LET'S MAKE THIS A LITTLE
MORE INTERESTING ...

SHOOTING YOURSELF WITH A BLANK
SKIPS THE DEALER'S TURN.

RACKS THE SHOTGUN.
EJECTS CURRENT SHELL.

TAKES THE EDGE OFF.
REGAIN 1 CHARGE.

CHECK THE CURRENT ROUND
IN THE CHAMBER.

SWAPS THE POLARITY OF THE
CURRENT SHELL IN THE CHAMBER.

STEAL AN ITEM AND
USE IT IMMEDIATELY.

50% CHANCE TO REGAIN 2 CHARGES.
IF NOT, LOSE 1 CHARGE.

A MYSTERIOUS VOICE GIVES
YOU INSIGHT FROM THE FUTURE.

LONG LAST, WE ARRIVE
AT THE FINAL SHOWDOWN.

NO MORE DEFIBRILLATORS.
NO MORE BLOOD TRANSFUSIONS.

NOW, ME AND YOU, WE ARE DANCING
ON THE EDGE OF LIFE AND DEATH.

I BETTER NOT
SEE YOU AGAIN.
MAY IMPAIR YOUR ABILITY TO DRIVE

SPECIAL THANKS

Hürcan ‘horrorvisuals’ Köse
Turtle Pals Tapes
1jem - OpenGL support
nicolith
